name: fucked
content:
in a very bad or difficult situation: If you don't know what you're doing, you're fucked.
broken or not working properly: The microphone's basically fucked.
UK very tired: I'd been working all night, and was totally fucked.
More examplesFewer examplesUnless we work together we are fucked.If they carry on drinking like that their livers will be fucked by the time they're twenty.I think the electric windows are fucked.
